__TOC__

* Contact: Adam Niedling (kricsek et yahoo d√∂t com)
* Make: Fujitsu Siemens
* Model: Amilo La1703
* Website: http://www.fujitsu-siemens.com/home/products/notebooks/amilo_la_1703.html

=== Hardy ===

* Live CD should be used in safe graphic mode because Ubuntu doesn't detect the native resolution properly.
* Sound and microphone works but they're muted by default.
* Wifi only works with ndiswrapper.
* 2D and Video acceleration works with driver from http://linux.via.com.tw/. For proper resolution you need to follow instructions on <nowiki>[[http://www.tkarena.com/forums/linux-arena/37154-desktop-effects-amilo-pro-3515-vn896-guide.html|this]]</nowiki> page. Change Load "glx" to Disable "glx" in configuration file, otherwise driver hangs if you try to use OpenGL. 3D acceleration does not work.
* Screen doesn't turn off in power saving mode.

=== Gutsy ===

Gutsy won't install on this laptop at all because the x server can't start, not even in safe mode. However I was able to install and update Gutsy Tribe 5 with no problems. It is also possible to install 'dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg' at the live cd before install and set the resolution to 1280x800 and then a startx. After the installation the proper resolution can only be set by issuing the "dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" command because the screen and graphics menu doesn't work properly. 3D graphics is not supported because the openchrome driver is still under in the early stage of development, but the vesa driver can display proper resolution and play movies. The sound problem is partly resolved, because the speaker still doesn't make any sound but at least the headphones can produce low volume of sound (with ALSA drivers). Latest OSS drivers (http://www.opensound.com/oss.html) works perfectly. However a secondary monitor/beamer doesn't show anything. The brightness adjustment buttons do not work always properly.

=== Feisty ===

X starts but not with the correct resolution. During the installation the window is too big so its bottom doesn't fit in the screen. I had to push the buttons blindly and used the tab key to navigate. There is no 3D acceleration and there is no sound. WLAN doesn't work automatically but this problem can be fixed. Ubuntu doesn't like this laptop.

Problematic hardware: 
************ Video card: VIA VN896 Chrome9 HC
************ Sound card: VIA HD Audio Codec VT8237A
************ WLAN: sis163u
